results.name: a(n) = A032742(n) AND A001065(n)-A032742(n), where AND is bitwise-and (A004198) and A001065 = sum of proper divisors and A032742 = the largest proper divisor of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
